### This file records differences between the local version and the LIVE version on SAVI server.

**2.1.15**

In the scripts_GPfunctions.R file, in the line *maxSample <- min(5000, nrow(NB))* the min is set to 5000, not 7500 as in LIVE.

In the server.R file pdf is removed as an option in the file download tab section.

In the ui.R file pdf is removed as an option in the file download tab section.
